tutorialPrompts.title: HUD
tutorialPrompts.body: Red Bar: HP, Yellow Bar: Stamina, Black Bar: Durability, Blue Bar: EXP

tutorialPrompts.title: Walk
tutorialPrompts.body: A:Left D:Right

tutorialPrompts.title: Jump
tutorialPrompts.body: Press Spacebar

tutorialPrompts.title: Attack
tutorialPrompts.body: Press J

tutorialPrompts.title: Kill An Enemy
tutorialPrompts.body: Enemies drop experience

tutorialPrompts.title: Chop Down Trees
tutorialPrompts.body: Hold down L when facing trees

tutorialPrompts.title: Tree Drops
tutorialPrompts.body: Trees drop money, and health

tutorialPrompts.title: Be Careful
tutorialPrompts.body: The more trees you chop, the faster your health goes down

tutorialPrompts.title: Back To Ship
tutorialPrompts.body: Press B to teleport back to the ship

tutorialPrompts.title: Don't Die
tutorialPrompts.body: Collect Money, and advance onto harder planets

tutorialPrompts.title: Skills
tutorialPrompts.body: Skills can be unlocked to enhance your gameplay

tutorialPrompts.title: Unlocked Vs Selected
tutorialPrompts.body: Once a skill is unlocked, it is not applied to the axe. You must select a skill to add it

tutorialPrompts.title: Presets
tutorialPrompts.body: Six presets can be edited to have different skills on them

tutorialPrompts.title: Switching Axes
tutorialPrompts.body: Press 1-6, on a planet, to change between axes when they break, or when you feel like it

tutorialPrompts.title: Buying Axes
tutorialPrompts.body: The more skills you have on an axe, the higher the price it is to buy

tutorialPrompts.title: Choosing Skills
tutorialPrompts.body: Choose axe skills based on the situation

tutorialPrompts.title: Skill Points
tutorialPrompts.body: SKills cost points, that are gained by leveling up

tutorialPrompts.title: Quests
tutorialPrompts.body: View your spoils of war here!

tutorialPrompts.title: Ship Menu
tutorialPrompts.body: Here you can choose what planet to invade

tutorialPrompts.title: Other Options
tutorialPrompts.body: You can access keybinds, axe presets, save the game, or return to the start menu
